## Validation

- [ ] `python -m pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt`
- [ ] `python -m ruff check .`
- [ ] `python -m ruff format --check .`
- [ ] `python -m pytest`

- [ ] Backward compatibility preserved
- [ ] Security implications reviewed

- [ ] No secrets committed
